title: Theme Options â€“ Reading Page

fields.label: Max Content Width
fields.name: max_content_width
fields.instructions: This is the container MAX width in pixels. If nothing is set here.

fields.label: Body Font Size
fields.name: body_font_size_reading
fields.instructions: This is the max size that will be used on full width screens.

fields.label: Heading 1 Font Size
fields.name: heading_1_font_size_reading
fields.instructions: This is the max size that will be used on full width screens.

fields.label: Heading 2 Font Size
fields.name: heading_2_font_size_reading
fields.instructions: This is the max size that will be used on full width screens.

fields.label: Heading 3 Font Size
fields.name: heading_3_font_size_reading
fields.instructions: This is the max size that will be used on full width screens.

fields.label: Heading 4 Font Size
fields.name: heading_4_font_size_reading
fields.instructions: This is the max size that will be used on full width screens.

fields.label: Heading 5 Font Size
fields.name: heading_5_font_size_reading
fields.instructions: This is the max size that will be used on full width screens.

fields.label: Heading 6 Font Size
fields.name: heading_6_font_size_reading
fields.instructions: This is the max size that will be used on full width screens.

description: All font sizes in this section will be active on the "Reading Font Size" page template.

fields.label: Container Width
fields.name: container_width
fields.instructions: This is the container MAX width in pixels. If nothing is set here. The width will be set to 1640px

fields.label: Home Container Width
fields.name: home_container_width
fields.instructions: This is the container MAX width on the homepage in pixels. If this is not filled in, it will default to the main container width above.

fields.label: Header/Footer Container Width
fields.name: headerfooter_container_width
fields.instructions: This is the container MAX width in the header and footer in pixels. If this is not filled in, it will default to the main container width above.

fields.label: Facebook Opengraph Image
fields.name: facebook_opengraph_image
fields.instructions: This is the default image used in the facebook open graph code.

fields.label: Fixed Pagebreak Background
fields.name: fixed_pagebreak_background
fields.instructions: Do you want to set ALL pagebreak backgrounds as position fixed? NOTE: This can be overwritten on an individual level per pagebreak.

fields.label: ul li bullet
fields.name: ul_li_bullet
fields.instructions: This should be around 10px by 10px at the most.

fields.label: Pagebreak Padding Top
fields.name: pagebreak_padding_top
fields.instructions: This is a number in pxs that will apply to the padding TOP of page breaks and page break fix divs. If nothing is filled in, this will default to 50px

fields.label: Pagebreak Padding Bottom
fields.name: pagebreak_padding_bottom
fields.instructions: This is a number in pxs that will apply to the padding TOP of page breaks and page break fix divs. If nothing is filled in, this will default to the padding-top setting.

fields.label: Optional Title
fields.name: optional_title
fields.instructions: This title is optional. If nothing is filled in here the title "Tips for Caregivers:" will show instead.

fields.label: Testimonial(s) to Display
fields.name: testimonial_to_display
fields.instructions: If more than one testimonial is selected, ONE of the selected testimonials will be pulled randomly on the page at a time.

fields.label: Confetti?
fields.name: confetti
fields.instructions: Should there be confetti on this page?

fields.label: Progress Bar?
fields.name: progress_bar
fields.instructions: Should this page have a progress bar?

fields.label: Page Break Background
fields.name: page_break_background
fields.instructions: NOTE: If using the left image or right image layout, it will look broken without an image.

fields.label: Callout 01 Title Icon
fields.name: callout_01_title_icon
fields.instructions: Icon must be 36px wide and 36px tall

fields.label: Callout 02 Title Icon
fields.name: callout_02_title_icon
fields.instructions: Icon must be 36px wide and 36px tall

fields.label: Callout 03 Title Icon
fields.name: callout_03_title_icon
fields.instructions: Icon must be 36px wide and 36px tall

fields.label: Google Font embed Link(s)
fields.name: google_font_embed_links
fields.instructions: This is the "link" option in google webfonts. Just paste that whole box of stuff here. This will add your desired google webfont into the site.
fields.default_value:
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@300;400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

fields.label: Primary Font
fields.name: primary_font
fields.instructions: This is JUST the font string. DO NOT include the "font-family:" portion.

fields.label: Body Font Size
fields.name: body_font_size
fields.instructions: This is the max size that will be used on full width screens.

fields.label: Main Heading Font
fields.name: main_heading_font
fields.instructions:
If you want to use the same font for all headings, paste it here. This is JUST the font string. DO NOT include the "font-family:" portion.
Each individual heading font can be overwritten with the following fields.

fields.instructions: If nothing is entered here then this will default back to the Secondary Color set in the General Settings.

title: Theme Options - Colors

fields.label: Primary Site Color
fields.name: primary_site_color
fields.instructions: This is the primary text color.

fields.label: Secondary Color
fields.name: secondary_color
fields.instructions: This is the secondary color for the website. By default this is the color that the headings on the site are set to.

fields.label: Button Text Color
fields.name: button_color
fields.instructions: This is the button text color.

fields.label: Button Background Color
fields.name: button_background_color
fields.instructions: This is the button background color. This is also the color used on the button border by default. This can be overwritten in the child theme.

fields.label: Button Background Image
fields.name: button_background_image
fields.instructions: Please Note: this will NOT overwrite the button background color. They work in tandem. So set your button background to transparent if you don't want a background color behind your image.

fields.label: Button Text Hover Color
fields.name: button_hover_color
fields.instructions: This is the button text color on hover.

fields.label: Button Hover Background Color
fields.name: button_hover_background_color
fields.instructions: This is the button background color on hover. This is also the color used on the button border by default. This can be overwritten in the child theme.

fields.label: Button Hover Background Image
fields.name: button_hover_background_image
fields.instructions: Please Note: this will NOT overwrite the button background color. They work in tandem. So set your button background to transparent if you don't want a background color behind your image.

fields.label: Button Border Radius
fields.name: button_border_radius
fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels.

fields.label: Button Border Thickness
fields.name: button_border_thickness
fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels.

fields.label: Button Padding Top
fields.name: button_padding_top
fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If nothing is filled in, this will default to 10.

fields.label: Button Padding Right
fields.name: button_padding_right
fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If nothing is filled in, this will default to 10.

fields.label: Button Padding Bottom
fields.name: button_padding_bottom
fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If nothing is filled in, this will default to 10.

fields.label: Button Padding Left
fields.name: button_padding_left
fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If nothing is filled in, this will default to 10.

fields.label: Big Button Padding Top
fields.name: big_button_padding_top
fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If nothing is filled in, this will default to the button padding settings.

fields.label: Big Button Padding Right
fields.name: big_button_padding_right
fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If nothing is filled in, this will default to the button padding settings.

fields.label: Big Button Padding Bottom
fields.name: big_button_padding_bottom
fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If nothing is filled in, this will default to the button padding settings.

fields.label: Big Button Padding Left
fields.name: big_button_padding_left
fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If nothing is filled in, this will default to the button padding settings.

fields.label: Pagebreak Button Background Image
fields.name: pagebreak_button_background_image
fields.instructions: Please Note: this will NOT overwrite the button background color. They work in tandem. So set your button background to transparent if you don't want a background color behind your image.

fields.label: Pagebreak Button Hover Background Image
fields.name: pagebreak_button_hover_background_image
fields.instructions: Please Note: this will NOT overwrite the button background color. They work in tandem. So set your button background to transparent if you don't want a background color behind your image.

fields.label: Login Screen Background Color
fields.name: login_screen_background_color
fields.instructions: If nothing is selected here this color will default to the body BG color.

description: There's no need to add black, white, or grey. The theme already has #ccc and #666 built in. These colors are set to variables in the _vars.scss file. These values can be overwritten in the main.scss or _vars.scss file in the child theme.

fields.label: Default Header Image
fields.name: default_header_image
fields.instructions: This is the default header image if there is no featured image on the page or post. This is also the header image for the index, archive, 404, and search pages.

fields.label: Top Navbar Padding
fields.name: top_navbar_padding
fields.instructions: This is optional top and bottom padding on the top navbar.

fields.label: Top Nav - Tab Style Navigation
fields.name: top_nav_tab_style_navigation
fields.instructions: If this setting is set to "Yes" your navigation will have a negative margin-bottom equal to your bottom padding minus 10px.

fields.label: Main Navbar Padding
fields.name: main_navbar_padding
fields.instructions: This is optional top and bottom padding on the top navbar.

fields.label: Main Nav - Tab Style Navigation
fields.name: main_nav_tab_style_navigation
fields.instructions: If this setting is set to "Yes" your navigation will have a negative margin-bottom equal to your bottom padding minus 10px.

fields.label: Navigation Overlapping the Content
fields.name: navigation_overlapping_the_content
fields.instructions: If this option is set to YES, the content will move up under the nav. This will look weird if the nav doesn't have a transparent background.

fields.label: Top Nav Dropdown Background Color
fields.name: top_nav_dropdown_background_color
fields.instructions: If nothing is selected here, the dropdown background color will default to the top nav background color.

fields.label: Top Nav Link Background Hover Color
fields.name: top_nav_link_background_hover_color

fields.label: Main Nav Dropdown Background Color
fields.name: main_nav_dropdown_background_color
fields.instructions: If nothing is selected here, the dropdown background color will default to the main nav background color.

fields.label: Main Nav Link Background Hover Color
fields.name: main_nav_link_background_hover_color

fields.label: Optional Footer Logo
fields.name: optional_footer_logo
fields.instructions: This is optional. If nothing is uploaded to this field the footer logo will default to the Site Logo. Set in the general site settings.

fields.label: Social Media
fields.name: social_media
fields.instructions: Add as many or as few social media links as you need.

sub_fields.label: Social Icon
sub_fields.name: social_icon
sub_fields.instructions: You can find your icon options here. Just find the icon you want and paste the text for that icon here.

sub_fields.label: Social Title
sub_fields.name: social_title
sub_fields.instructions: This is for ADA purposes.

choices.news: News (Uses the Standard WP Post Type)
choices.team: Team (Not a Post Type! This uses a custom Block)

fields.label: Alternate Name for "Posts"
fields.name: alternate_name_for_posts
fields.instructions: If you want to rename "Posts" to "News" or anything else put that here.

fields.label: Alternate Name for "Projects"
fields.name: alternate_name_for_projects
fields.instructions: If you want to rename "Projects" to anything else put that here. If you change this name MAKE SURE TO FLUSH THE PERMALINKS.

fields.label: Alternate Name for "Resources"
fields.name: alternate_name_for_resources
fields.instructions: If you want to rename "Resources" to anything else put that here. If you change this name MAKE SURE TO FLUSH THE PERMALINKS.

fields.label: News Options
fields.name: news_options
fields.instructions: These are options that will change the Standard WP Post Type.

sub_fields.name: background_hover_color
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is set here, it will stay transparent.

sub_fields.label: Border Color - Left

sub_fields.label: Featured Image Placement
sub_fields.name: featured_image_placement
sub_fields.instructions: Left and right will both be centered above the post on mobile.

sub_fields.label: Featured Image Width
sub_fields.name: featured_image_width
sub_fields.instructions: Number in px. This is the MAX width of the featured image size. It will automatically scale with the post.

sub_fields.label: Featured Image Height
sub_fields.name: featured_image_height
sub_fields.instructions: Number in px. This is the MAX height of the featured image size. It will automatically scale with the post.

sub_fields.label: Featured Image Border Radius
sub_fields.name: featured_image_border_radius
sub_fields.instructions: This is a number in percentage. This can be 0 through 50. 50% would make the image a circle.

sub_fields.label: Featured Image Overlay
sub_fields.name: featured_image_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is filled in the color will be transparent.

sub_fields.label: Featured Image Border Width
sub_fields.name: featured_image_border_width
sub_fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If left blank there will be no border.

sub_fields.label: Featured Image Border Color
sub_fields.name: featured_image_border_color
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is filled in the color will be transparent.

sub_fields.label: Featured Image Border Color - Top
sub_fields.name: featured_image_border_color_top
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is filled in the border color will default to the overall border color.

sub_fields.label: Featured Image Border Color - Right
sub_fields.name: featured_image_border_color_right
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is filled in the border color will default to the overall border color.

sub_fields.label: Featured Image Border Color - Bottom
sub_fields.name: featured_image_border_color_bottom
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is filled in the border color will default to the overall border color.

sub_fields.label: Featured Image Border Color - Left
sub_fields.name: featured_image_border_color_left
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is filled in the border color will default to the overall border color.

sub_fields.label: Post Date Font
sub_fields.name: post_date_font
sub_fields.instructions: If you want to overwrite the "Main Heading Font" set in the general site settings, you can do that here. If nothing is filled in here, this field will default to the overall header font. This is JUST the font string. DO NOT include the "font-family:" portion.

sub_fields.label: Post Date Size
sub_fields.name: post_date_size
sub_fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If left blank it will default to the H6 size.

sub_fields.label: Post Date Text
sub_fields.name: post_date_text
sub_fields.instructions: This text is optional. If nothing is filled in just the date will show.

sub_fields.label: Post Date Format
sub_fields.name: post_date_format
sub_fields.instructions: Select the format of your post date. You can see your options here. If nothing is filled in the format will read "m-d-y"

sub_fields.label: Post Date Color
sub_fields.name: post_date_color
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is selected, this will default to the Primary Site Color set in the general site settings.

sub_fields.label: Post Date Hover Color
sub_fields.name: post_date_hover_color
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is selected, this will default to the Link Hover Color set in the general site settings.

sub_fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If left blank it will default to the H6 size.

sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is selected, this will default to the Link Hover Color set in the general site settings.

sub_fields.name: content_font_size
sub_fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If left blank it will default to the P size.

sub_fields.label: Image Max Width
sub_fields.name: image_max_width
sub_fields.instructions: This is the number in pixels that will be height and width of the auto generated thumbnail for the image. (that means it will be a square). It will auto crop to the top center of the image, so keep that in mind when using the block.

sub_fields.label: Image Border Radius
sub_fields.name: image_border_radius
sub_fields.instructions: This is a number in percentage. This can be 0 through 50. 50% would make the image a circle.

sub_fields.label: Image Border Width
sub_fields.name: image_border_width
sub_fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If nothing is set here, there will be no border.

sub_fields.label: Image Border Color
sub_fields.name: image_border_color
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is set here, it will stay transparent.

sub_fields.label: Image Border Color - Top
sub_fields.name: image_border_color_top
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is set here, each border will default to the overall border color.

sub_fields.label: Image Border Color - Right
sub_fields.name: image_border_color_right
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is set here, each border will default to the overall border color.

sub_fields.label: Image Border Color - Bottom
sub_fields.name: image_border_color_bottom
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is set here, each border will default to the overall border color.

sub_fields.label: Image Border Color - Left
sub_fields.name: image_border_color_left
sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is set here, each border will default to the overall border color.

sub_fields.label: Name Font
sub_fields.name: name_font
sub_fields.instructions: If you want to overwrite the "Main Heading Font" set in the general site settings, you can do that here. If nothing is filled in here, this field will default to the overall header font. This is JUST the font string. DO NOT include the "font-family:" portion.

sub_fields.label: Name Color

sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is selected, this will default to the Secondary Color set in the general site settings.

sub_fields.instructions: This is a number in pixels. If nothing is set here, there will be no border.

sub_fields.instructions: If nothing is set here, it will stay transparent.

sub_fields.name: content_font
sub_fields.instructions: If you want to overwrite the "Primary Font" set in the general site settings, you can do that here. If nothing is filled in here, this field will default to the overall main site font. This is JUST the font string. DO NOT include the "font-family:" portion.

fields.label: Number of columns
fields.name: number_of_columns
fields.instructions: NOTE: The number of columns dictates the number of posts to show. If you wish to show more than one row of posts use the "MC Posts Page" block.

fields.label: Optional Button Link Text
fields.name: optional_button_link_text
fields.instructions: If this is not filled in the button text will read "Learn More".

fields.label: Project Category
fields.name: post_category
fields.instructions: Project Category to Display

fields.label: Number of columns
fields.name: number_of_columns
fields.instructions: NOTE: The number of columns dictates the number of posts to show. If you wish to show more than one row of posts use the "MC Posts Page" block.

fields.label: Optional Button Link Text
fields.name: optional_button_link_text
fields.instructions: If this is not filled in the button text will read "Learn More".

fields.label: Post Category
fields.name: post_category
fields.instructions: Post Category to Display

fields.label: Number of columns
fields.name: number_of_columns
fields.instructions: NOTE: The number of columns dictates the number of posts to show. If you wish to show more than one row of posts use the "MC Posts Page" block.

fields.label: Optional Button Link Text
fields.name: optional_button_link_text
fields.instructions: If this is not filled in the button text will read "Learn More".

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: background_color
fields.instructions: NOTE: If using the left image or right image layout, this color will be the background color of the content side of the page break. If you are using the full width layout AND a page break background image this color will overlay the image.

fields.label: Page Break Background
fields.name: page_break_background
fields.instructions: NOTE: If using the left image or right image layout, it will look broken without an image.

fields.label: Additional Pagebreak Classes
fields.name: additional_pagebreak_classes
fields.instructions: NOTE: the overlap class only works in conjunction with left or right image page break style.

fields.label: Image Border Radius
fields.name: image_border_radius
fields.instructions: This is a measurement in px of the border radius of the corners of the pagebreak image.

fields.label: Fixed position background
fields.name: fixed_position_background
fields.instructions: Would you like this pagebreak to have a fixed background? aka parallax style.

fields.label: Pagebreak Container Option
fields.name: container_option
fields.instructions: Should the pagebreak have a container in it?

fields.label: Border-Top Width
fields.name: border-top_width
fields.instructions: This is a number in PX

fields.label: Border-Bottom Width
fields.name: border-bottom_width
fields.instructions: This is a number in PX

fields.label: Button Link
fields.name: button_link
fields.instructions: Don't forget the https:// in your link.

choices.center: Center (will keep its initial width but center itself on the page)
